doc.title: Sisters
doc.plot: "less than one percent of all murders in north america are termed Sororicide - murder between Sisters. of that one percent, only one case has never resulted in prosecution." With these chilling words begins a uniquely horrific short film chronicling the final days of CANDICE and her young sister ASHLEY. Candice's dark obsession will plunge both sisters into a deadly battle of wills, and challenge a bond often viewed as unbreakable.
